mapper.select: SELECT start_time, end_time FROM overtime_approval WHERE requester_id = #{requesterId} AND approval_status = "A" AND cancel_yn = "N" AND cancel_document_id = 0 AND (STR_TO_DATE(start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') BETWEEN #{sunday} AND #{saturday});

SELECT a.employee_name, a.employee_number, b.id, b.start_time, b.end_time, b.content, b.approval_status, b.write_time, b.cancel_yn, b.cancel_document_id, b.requester_id
, b.info_id, c.type_name
FROM employee a JOIN
bt_approval b
overtime_approval b
rw_approval b
vacation_approval b
ON a.id = b.requester_id
JOIN vacation_type c ON c.id = b.info_id
WHERE b.approval_status = 'A'
WHERE b.approval_status = 'D'
WHERE b.approval_status = 'N' OR b.approval_status = 'V'
WHERE b.cancel_yn = 'Y' OR b.cancel_document_id != 0
WHERE b.approval_status = 'A' AND b.cancel_yn = 'N' AND b.cancel_document_id = 0
ORDER BY b.write_time DESC;

SELECT b.id, b.content, c.employee_name, c.employee_number, b.write_time, b.approval_status, b.cancel_yn, b.cancel_document_id FROM
bt_approval_chain a JOIN bt_approval b
o_approval_chain a JOIN overtime_approval b
rw_approval_chain a JOIN rw_approval b
v_approval_chain a JOIN vacation_approval b
ON a.approval_id = b.id JOIN employee c ON b.requester_id = c.id WHERE a.employee_id = #{approverId}
AND b.approval_status = 'A'
AND b.approval_status = 'D'
AND (b.approval_status = 'N' OR b.approval_status = 'V')
AND (cancel_yn = 'Y' OR cancel_document_id != 0)
AND (b.approval_status = 'N' OR b.approval_status = 'V') AND a.approval_status = 'W'
ORDER BY b.write_time DESC;

SELECT id, start_time, end_time, content, approval_status, write_time, cancel_yn, cancel_document_id, requester_id FROM
bt_approval
vacation_approval
WHERE #{today} BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND approval_status = 'A' AND cancel_yn = 'N' AND cancel_document_id = 0;
